reviews.review: Highly recommend. Ari had a very unique style of teaching where the entire class felt like an open discussion. He would always push us to be leaders and gave a ton of perspective on any topic due to how much knowledge he carries. The grade distribution is a huge plus as well.
Such an amazing class. Really introspective. Be prepared to participate. As long as you follow the rubric and do the weekly readings, you will succeed!

This is hands down the best teacher or professor I have ever had in my life. The class is very easy and Ari makes it so fun. Originally I was taking this to get the easy A, but this is my favorite class I have ever taken in college thanks to Ari. This man is such a nice guy, he genuinely cares about his students and it shows. 
Also if you are worried about the class being 2 hours and 15 minutes don't be, we usually end class after an hour of being there.
If you are thinking about taking this class or this professor please do it.
